name: Start Research Inc.
description: Developer of an analyst marketplace designed to discover investment opportunities. The company's platform quantitatively and qualitatively rates cryptocurrencies by using a contributor model that rewards users for correct calls, enabling investors with an improved market movement understanding.
one_liner: Developer of an analyst marketplace designed to discover investment opportunities. The company's platform quantitatively and qualitatively rates cryptocurrencies by using a contributor model that rewards users for correct calls, enabling investors with an improved market movement understanding.

name: BitPowr Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. The company's platform provides a modular ecosystem of critical blockchain and web3 infrastructure for businesses to build blockchain-powered products, enabling businesses and developers to a blockchain and digital assets infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. The company's platform provides a modular ecosystem of critical blockchain and web3 infrastructure for businesses to build blockchain-powered products, enabling businesses and developers to a blockchain and digital assets infrastructure.

name: The BLVD, Inc.
description: Developer of a blockchain lab platform designed to make non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and Decentralized Autonomous organizations (DAOs). The company offers a vehicle for funding innovative projects that will develop the ecosystem, simple documents, signed with crypto wallets, optional Twitter and Discord handles, guestbooks, and even contracts with partners and freelancers, allowing users to play games and earn NFTs for using their products.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain lab platform designed to make non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and Decentralized Autonomous organizations (DAOs). The company offers a vehicle for funding innovative projects that will develop the ecosystem, simple documents, signed with crypto wallets, optional Twitter and Discord handles, guestbooks, and even contracts with partners and freelancers, allowing users to play games and earn NFTs for using their products.

name: Blue Studios.io Inc.
description: Developer of a Web3 family crypto wallet designed to create opportunities for families to come together to plan, invest, learn, and play. The company's platform provides families with tools and software to reimagine what families can do together with money and assets, enabling families to get empowered to be the custodians of their data and wealth.
one_liner: Developer of a Web3 family crypto wallet designed to create opportunities for families to come together to plan, invest, learn, and play. The company's platform provides families with tools and software to reimagine what families can do together with money and assets, enabling families to get empowered to be the custodians of their data and wealth.

name: Dinari, Inc.
description: Operator of stock options and incentive management platform intended to provide direct exposure to stock plans and public trading. The company's platform offers a wide range of services from equity management and options grants to payroll compliance, taxes, and vesting schedules, enabling investors with direct exposure to the trusted asset with simple and easy incentive management
one_liner: Operator of stock options and incentive management platform intended to provide direct exposure to stock plans and public trading. The company's platform offers a wide range of services from equity management and options grants to payroll compliance, taxes, and vesting schedules, enabling investors with direct exposure to the trusted asset with simple and easy incentive management

name: Halogen Capital Sdn. Bhd.
description: Developer of a digital platform designed to help investors gain exposure safely to the new asset classes. The company specializes in digital assets and combines traditional capital market expertise with deep technology knowledge, enabling clients to access digital assets, and help with private key management, tax uncertainties, and inconsistent fund reporting.
one_liner: Developer of a digital platform designed to help investors gain exposure safely to the new asset classes. The company specializes in digital assets and combines traditional capital market expertise with deep technology knowledge, enabling clients to access digital assets, and help with private key management, tax uncertainties, and inconsistent fund reporting.

name: Good Morning Ser Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a metaverse integrated platform intended to facilitate non-fungible token trading. The company's platform assists creators in launching customized non-fungible tokens to connect and engage with their fanbase and community in real-time, enabling content creators to have an easy and cost-effective medium of connecting fans.
one_liner: Operator of a metaverse integrated platform intended to facilitate non-fungible token trading. The company's platform assists creators in launching customized non-fungible tokens to connect and engage with their fanbase and community in real-time, enabling content creators to have an easy and cost-effective medium of connecting fans.

name: LedgiFi LLC.
description: Developer of a portfolio tracking platform intended to simplify cryptocurrency taxes. The company's platform specializes in syncing transactions, analyzing portfolios, and computing capital gains so users can be tax-compliant and makes the process of managing investments easy and appealing by tracking all assets, comparing investment alternatives, optimizing taxes, and allowing to share portfolios with friends, enabling people to grow their wealth and save the process of calculating payments.
one_liner: Developer of a portfolio tracking platform intended to simplify cryptocurrency taxes. The company's platform specializes in syncing transactions, analyzing portfolios, and computing capital gains so users can be tax-compliant and makes the process of managing investments easy and appealing by tracking all assets, comparing investment alternatives, optimizing taxes, and allowing to share portfolios with friends, enabling people to grow their wealth and save the process of calculating payments.

name: Byterum Holdings Ltd
description: Developer of non-fungible token data aggregation platform designed to track, analyze, and discover valuable NFTs. The company's platform uses a self-developed stable blockchain data collection engine to obtain the latest on-chain transaction data from the blockchain and parses it into readable NFT transaction and market data, enabling NFT project parties to accurately acquire customers, and helping users better obtain the new NFT market trends.
one_liner: Developer of non-fungible token data aggregation platform designed to track, analyze, and discover valuable NFTs. The company's platform uses a self-developed stable blockchain data collection engine to obtain the latest on-chain transaction data from the blockchain and parses it into readable NFT transaction and market data, enabling NFT project parties to accurately acquire customers, and helping users better obtain the new NFT market trends.

name: PKO Inc.
description: collective of Founders, Creators, Execs, Artists, Angels & Investors at the intersection of Tech & Entertainment
one_liner: collective of Founders, Creators, Execs, Artists, Angels & Investors at the intersection of Tech & Entertainment

name: portto Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of dApp browser Blocto. The company aims to bring block chain usage to the masses through its seamless dApp browser Blocto, enabling users to purchase and utilize crypto assets.
one_liner: Developer of dApp browser Blocto. The company aims to bring block chain usage to the masses through its seamless dApp browser Blocto, enabling users to purchase and utilize crypto assets.

name: Pravica Incorporated
description: Developer of a communication platform designed to empower privacy. The company's platform offers a medium of secure communication using blockchain technology, enabling enterprises to communicate internally and externally in a private and secure way.
one_liner: Developer of a communication platform designed to empower privacy. The company's platform offers a medium of secure communication using blockchain technology, enabling enterprises to communicate internally and externally in a private and secure way.

name: Project A Research Corporation
description: Developer of a social trading network intended to create, share, discover and execute diverse trade ideas. The company's platform provides a social trading application that makes financial influencers manage portfolios with friends, offers trading strategies, and lets users get paid directly by their fans, enabling users to monetize their skills by sharing trade ideas and launching their own funds.
one_liner: Developer of a social trading network intended to create, share, discover and execute diverse trade ideas. The company's platform provides a social trading application that makes financial influencers manage portfolios with friends, offers trading strategies, and lets users get paid directly by their fans, enabling users to monetize their skills by sharing trade ideas and launching their own funds.

name: Rain Financial, Inc.
description: Developer of a cryptocurrency trading platform designed to give licensed digital currency exchange in the Middle East. The company's platform offers cryptocurrency exchange operating out of the regulatory sandbox, enabling clients to buy, sell, and store digital currency in a regulated, secure, and compliant way.
one_liner: Developer of a cryptocurrency trading platform designed to give licensed digital currency exchange in the Middle East. The company's platform offers cryptocurrency exchange operating out of the regulatory sandbox, enabling clients to buy, sell, and store digital currency in a regulated, secure, and compliant way.

name: Vega Corp.
description: Developer of a mobile application designed for trading crypto, stocks, NFTs, and more with existing brokerages and wallets. The company offers secured, private and non-custodial software to manage everything from stocks to tokens to non-fungible tokens, keep track of investors, and monetize the existing portfolio, enabling users to align with the vision for the future of fintech.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application designed for trading crypto, stocks, NFTs, and more with existing brokerages and wallets. The company offers secured, private and non-custodial software to manage everything from stocks to tokens to non-fungible tokens, keep track of investors, and monetize the existing portfolio, enabling users to align with the vision for the future of fintech.

name: Send4 Tecnologia Ltda.
description: Developer of a reverse logistics platform intended to simplify the process of exchange and returns for both customers and brands. The company's platform connects consumers to brands through interfaces in an omnichannel concept, increasing logistics and service efficiency and eliminating customer experience gaps in the process of exchanging and returning purchases, enabling retailers to offer a seamless post-purchase experience to their customers.
one_liner: Developer of a reverse logistics platform intended to simplify the process of exchange and returns for both customers and brands. The company's platform connects consumers to brands through interfaces in an omnichannel concept, increasing logistics and service efficiency and eliminating customer experience gaps in the process of exchanging and returning purchases, enabling retailers to offer a seamless post-purchase experience to their customers.

name: Springcoin, Inc.
description: Developer of a decentralized network designed to permit participants to share and exchange information about financial data. The company's network leverages the security, scalability, transparency, and efficiency of blockchain technology to provide financial institutions and lenders with greater data control and flexibility for the credit system, enabling clients to improve the protection and security of their credit information.
one_liner: Developer of a decentralized network designed to permit participants to share and exchange information about financial data. The company's network leverages the security, scalability, transparency, and efficiency of blockchain technology to provide financial institutions and lenders with greater data control and flexibility for the credit system, enabling clients to improve the protection and security of their credit information.

name: String Technology Inc
description: Developer of a digital platform designed to integrate fiat payments into Web3 games. The company's platform builds credit card and bank payments for NFTs and tokens directly into your game environment, enabling clients to have full control over their experience and lets games own the user journey from end-to-end.
one_liner: Developer of a digital platform designed to integrate fiat payments into Web3 games. The company's platform builds credit card and bank payments for NFTs and tokens directly into your game environment, enabling clients to have full control over their experience and lets games own the user journey from end-to-end.

name: Takenos Inc.
description: Operator of a blockchain-based payment platform designed to offer cross-border workers to access their earnings instantly in cash or crypto. The company offers an international digital wallet to receive income from anywhere in the world and dispose of it as per preference, enabling users to receive payment from the company or platform they are working at.
one_liner: Operator of a blockchain-based payment platform designed to offer cross-border workers to access their earnings instantly in cash or crypto. The company offers an international digital wallet to receive income from anywhere in the world and dispose of it as per preference, enabling users to receive payment from the company or platform they are working at.

name: Aingel Corp.
description: Operator of modern financial tools intended to provide access to corporate cards and advanced spending controls. The company's tools help to manage online ad spending, reduce declined transactions, costly foreign exchange fees, and unfavorable currency conversion rates, and manage subscription payments together in one place, enabling companies to make it easy to pay and control business expenses, including cross-border transactions.
one_liner: Operator of modern financial tools intended to provide access to corporate cards and advanced spending controls. The company's tools help to manage online ad spending, reduce declined transactions, costly foreign exchange fees, and unfavorable currency conversion rates, and manage subscription payments together in one place, enabling companies to make it easy to pay and control business expenses, including cross-border transactions.

name: Umoja Labs Corp.
description: The best and safest way to monetize your Bitcoin.
one_liner: The best and safest way to monetize your Bitcoin.

name: UniSub LLC
description: Developer of recurring crypto payment platform designed to allow people to avail subscriptions through crypto. The company's platform integrates crypto subscriptions, that make payments automatic, so customers don't have to make a payment or manually enter their payment information, enabling businesses to accept recurring crypto payments.
one_liner: Developer of recurring crypto payment platform designed to allow people to avail subscriptions through crypto. The company's platform integrates crypto subscriptions, that make payments automatic, so customers don't have to make a payment or manually enter their payment information, enabling businesses to accept recurring crypto payments.
industry: Blockchain, Crypto, FinTech, Gambling, Payments, SaaS, Web 3

name: &VOLUME LTD
description: &Volume is an AI-driven crypto management platform that trades on your behalf, adapting to market conditions and events, while you keep full control of your funds in your own account.
one_liner: &Volume is an AI-driven crypto management platform that trades on your behalf, adapting to market conditions and events, while you keep full control of your funds in your own account.

name: Zayn Tech Pte. Ltd.
description: Zayn Network is a cutting-edge modular Layer 2 ZK Sovereign Rollup uniting Bitcoin and Ethereum's strengths, offering trustless interoperability and optimized efficiency, scalability, and security, while targeting $2.8T RWA opportunities in MENAP and Southeast Asia, supported by prominent investors like 500 Global and Cur8 Capital.
one_liner: Zayn Network is a cutting-edge modular Layer 2 ZK Sovereign Rollup uniting Bitcoin and Ethereum's strengths, offering trustless interoperability and optimized efficiency, scalability, and security, while targeting $2.8T RWA opportunities in MENAP and Southeast Asia, supported by prominent investors like 500 Global and Cur8 Capital.

name: CYBAVO Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a crypto custody firm intended to provide advanced digital asset custody by developing a custom operating system. The company provides blockchain security solutions via a patented encryption technology, and a highly secure sandboxed environment to deliver its suite of solutions, thereby helping clients easily manage digital assets and prevent malicious attacks, theft, and loss.
one_liner: Operator of a crypto custody firm intended to provide advanced digital asset custody by developing a custom operating system. The company provides blockchain security solutions via a patented encryption technology, and a highly secure sandboxed environment to deliver its suite of solutions, thereby helping clients easily manage digital assets and prevent malicious attacks, theft, and loss.

name: ChangeCoin, Inc.
description: Developer of an application for making payments via social networks. The company's product ChangeTip integrates payment processing with social media which enables people to tip each other via social networks.
one_liner: Developer of an application for making payments via social networks. The company's product ChangeTip integrates payment processing with social media which enables people to tip each other via social networks.

name: Seed CX Ltd.
description: Provider of an online institutional trading platform intended for the emerging agricultural markets. The company's platform uses derivative tools to cultivate financial security in emerging agricultural markets with idiosyncratic production risks, enabling users to cure operational stability for hedgers and new trading opportunities for speculators.
one_liner: Provider of an online institutional trading platform intended for the emerging agricultural markets. The company's platform uses derivative tools to cultivate financial security in emerging agricultural markets with idiosyncratic production risks, enabling users to cure operational stability for hedgers and new trading opportunities for speculators.
